metadata.title: CVE-2023-36861 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the VZT LZMA_read_varintfunctionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vzt file can lead toarbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious file totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
